card_1.cardText:
> _“A couple of months ago, a lot of people were saying, you are gambling your career, youare about to have a baby, what are you doing? You know I had a baby, I carried the baby and now I am still winning awards!”_

CARDI B

card_10.cardText:
New mom and rapper Cardi B (25) took home 3 awards at the MTV Video Music Awards, including Best New Artist. Cardi B was the top contender with 10 nominations. Last month, she welcomed her first child, Kulture Kiari Cephus, with her husband, rapper Offset.

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-08-21-cardi-b-vmas/)
